definition[0]: to behave as if you think you are better, more intelligent, or more important than other people – used to show disapproval
example[0]: Take care not to condescend to your readers.
definition[1]: to do something in a way that shows you think it is below your social or professional position – used to show disapproval
example[1]: ‘Yes. I know, ’ Clara said, condescending to look at Rose for the first time.
